Epa Mario and Hojilla team! We send you a Bolivarian greeting from my Medical Team and my own! We are enjoying LaHojilla!
Walter's program was excellent. In these moments I take the snack! I start flying again as the Condor! We will live and come again

My campaign site has, tonight, a new look: http://t.co/EaXM2v7g. Send me all your comments! # FH2012
Congrats, girls! Very proud of you and all the students who took part! http://t.co/alESVqM0 #science #JO
Good morning, MundoBueno! I am very happy to see our VTV how the GranMisión ViviendaVenezuela advances! What beautiful buildings! VivirViviendo
about putting public finances in order: 'Not because of Brussels, but because it is a prerequisite for growth.' http://t.co/JmzkKeBT #CPB
The Lyon meeting is now and it's live here: http://t.co/qdFnB30h # FH2012
France has been weakened because it has split. #Lyon # FH2012
This method is about exacerbating problems rather than finding solutions. #Lyon # FH2012
This method consists of governing not in anticipation but in reaction. #Lyon # FH2012
This method consists of creating a melee rather than being above the melee. #Lyon # FH2012
Where is the project of the outgoing candidate? #Lyon # FH2012
At the same time I know his project: it's his record. That's why the French will prefer change. #Lyon # FH2012
Be the actors of hope, of the will to advance. #Lyon # FH2012
My project does not distinguish the French. #Lyon # FH2012
It is the outgoing power that has served his loved ones until introducing them into boards of directors. #Lyon # FH2012
The time of division, the time of favors, the time of privileges: that time is behind us. #Lyon # FH2012
If we want to get out of the crisis, we will only come out together. #Lyon # FH2012
The recovery of France requires the gathering of the French. #Lyon # FH2012
You are the assets of France. #Lyon # FH2012
The recovery will first be economic, industrial: it is the meaning of the productive pact that I proposed to the French. #Lyon # FH2012
This recovery can only be done in justice and cohesion. #Lyon # FH2012
Cohesion is the social pact passed between all citizens, it is the feeling of belonging to the same society. #Lyon # FH2012
The cohesion of a nation is to set limits to inequalities. #Lyon # FH2012
The French are ready to accept sacrifices when they serve the coming generation. #Lyon # FH2012
Patriotism is a good word. #Lyon # FH2012
Jaurès said that patriotism was to love others and that nationalism was to be wary of others. #Lyon # FH2012
Patriotism is also for those who are economic leaders ..
... to set an example to a country when there is an effort and recovery to engage. #Lyon # FH2012
What I propose is justice: an ambitious tax reform. #Lyon # FH2012
My project is France reconciled, yes reconciled. #Lyon # FH2012
The president will become a litigant like the others. #Lyon # FH2012
The independence of the judiciary will be strictly respected. #Lyon # FH2012
The remuneration of the President and the Ministers will be reduced by 30%. #Lyon # FH2012
We will expand the tax-research credit. #Lyon # FH2012
I want to reconcile the generations in the company, that's why I proposed the "generation contract". #Lyon # FH2012
The unemployment rate is high for the over 25s, but it is also for the over 55s! #Lyon # FH2012
I want to reconcile France with progress. #Lyon # FH2012
There is no economic progress on one side and the progress of another's society. #Lyon # FH2012
I will pursue a great policy of research and education, because school will be my priority. #Lyon # FH2012
I proposed the creation over 5 years of 60 000 jobs in the National Education. #Lyon # FH2012
I want to reconcile the French with the idea of ​​equality and first of all equality between men and women. #Lyon # FH2012
Equality is also the defense of purchasing power. #Lyon # FH2012
I prefer to tell the truth, in this campaign, I will make no promise that I will not be able to hold. #Lyon # FH2012
Will be introduced a progressive pricing of electricity, gas and water. #Lyon # FH2012
If the price of oil continues to rise, I will try to block the price of gasoline for 3 months. #Lyon # FH2012
Then, it will be the return of the floating TIPP. #Lyon # FH2012
I also want to reconcile France with its future. #Lyon # FH2012
We will make sure to get out of the crisis stronger than we had entered. #Lyon # FH2012
I want to reconcile France with Europe. France needs Europe and Europe needs France. #Lyon # FH2012
The crisis is not only economic, it is political and it is European. #Lyon # FH2012
Greece is on our knees and our duty as Europeans is to be united and at the same time demanding. #Lyon # FH2012
We will have to allow citizens to believe again in the beautiful European idea. #Lyon # FH2012
I pledged to bring public finances back to balance at the end of the next five years. #Lyon # FH2012
We have the duty to be those who will recover France. #Lyon # FH2012
Seriousness will not be enough, you also need growth. #Lyon # FH2012
I have chosen growth and the last choice for Europe will be whether it is mobilizing for democracy. #Lyon # FH2012
It is an essential choice for our country. #Lyon # FH2012
10 years that inequalities have widened and that France has weakened. #Lyon # FH2012
The presidential election is a decisive election for France, which will change our collective destiny. #Lyon # FH2012
We must live up to the appointment of the presidential election. #Lyon # FH2012
The only right we have is the right to protest as much as necessary .. #Lyon # FH2012
..but it's also the right, the very duty, to use your ballot. #Lyon # FH2012
It is a great honor to be a candidate in the presidential election. #Lyon # FH2012
This campaign is both exciting, hard and bitter. #Lyon # FH2012
I call you to participate massively in this beautiful adventure! #Lyon # FH2012
I want to give the new generation hope in politics. #Lyon # FH2012
Thank you for your trust, thank you for this united France, reconciled. #Lyon # FH2012
I am relieved at the arrival in Lebanon of Edith Bouvier and William Daniels, and their support by the Embassy of France. Finally!

Right now: The PM is holding a press conference in Canberra. Watch it live here - http://t.co/lj7GtQik TeamJG
Good evening, Vanessa and Yadira. Here we are Jorge, Nicolás, Rosa, María and I enjoying the program. I see that we advance in the GrandesMisiones
We must continue to move forward without respite in the battle against poverty, a perverse heritage of Capitalism. We will live and we will win!
At this moment I am signing 11.2 million for the quartets and logistical expenses of the Mission in Greater Love
Receiving the "Hungry No More Petition" signed by more than 16,000 Africans at the State House in Dar es Salaam on http://t.co/pQwcZvMu

European Council grants #Serbia #EU candidate status  Congratulations! Čestitamo! #euco
As I just said to the press, N. Sarkozy should not run a campaign of excess. # FH2012
All of my speech yesterday at #Lyon can be found here: http://t.co/VS1lrkk8 # FH2012
Israel is a racist state that will not have a place in the new map, while the many countries that are rooted in history like Lebanon will remain
If they reiterate that the president of Lebanon does not know what is in Lebanon, I know it is not important to know or not to know, but to know them so as not to repeat what they did in 2006
The word "purge" used by N. Sarkozy is anything but appropriate.
This term refers to periods of history that have no meaning in relation to what my words were.
This testifies to a culture of excess, of excess.
I publish today a tribune in Le Monde: "The law #Hadopi must be rethought". http://t.co/b7zOErGj # FH2012
Follow the live roundtable on gender equality that we are currently organizing at Campaign HQ: http://t.co/Cme1RaPA # FH2012
I want here to remind the fight of women. # FH2012
I will form a joint government, which will reinstate the Ministry of Women's Rights. # FH2012
We will remove state grants to political parties that do not comply with the law on parity. # FH2012
Large companies will have one year to comply with the Equal Pay Act. # FH2012
After one year, companies would lose their employee contribution exemptions. # FH2012
The abortion must be reimbursed at 100%. # FH2012
The feminisime, the fight for equality is a national and international challenge. # FH2012
We are regarded as the homeland of human rights, and therefore of women's rights. # FH2012
We need more shelter for women who are victims of violence. # FH2012
I want to express my respect for these associations that welcome women and children who are victims of violence. # FH2012
It is in the school that must be the first fight against violence and for respect and equality. # FH2012
If I announced more positions in the National Education, it is also for this learning of respect. # FH2012
We must be a peaceful, reconciled, united society. # FH2012
Secularism is what guarantees respect for equality between men and women. # FH2012
This is why I am committed to secularism becoming a constitutional principle. # FH2012
